statements: SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalImpactAnalysis;
SELECT record_id, impact_category, data_value FROM EnvironmentalImpactAnalysis WHERE data_value > 1000;
SELECT application_name, measurement_unit FROM EnvironmentalImpactAnalysis WHERE impact_category = 'Water Consumption';
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalImpactAnalysis ORDER BY data_value DESC;
SELECT application_name, impact_category, measurement_unit FROM EnvironmentalImpactAnalysis WHERE data_value < 500;
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalImpactAnalysis ORDER BY application_name DESC, impact_category ASC;
SELECT application_name, SUM(data_value) AS total_value FROM EnvironmentalImpactAnalysis GROUP BY application_name;
SELECT application_name, impact_category, measurement_unit, data_value FROM EnvironmentalImpactAnalysis WHERE impact_category='Water' AND data_value > 100;
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalImpactAnalysis WHERE data_value BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY data_value DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT application_name FROM EnvironmentalImpactAnalysis WHERE impact_category='Air';
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_analysis;
SELECT application_name, impact_description FROM environmental_impact_analysis WHERE impact_factor > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_analysis WHERE application_name = 'Product A';
SELECT impact_id, impact_factor FROM environmental_impact_analysis ORDER BY impact_factor DESC;
SELECT data_type, data_value FROM nanotechnology_data WHERE data_value < 100;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_analysis WHERE impact_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT application_name, impact_description FROM environmental_impact_analysis WHERE impact_factor > 0.5 ORDER BY application_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM nanotechnology_data WHERE data_type = 'research' ORDER BY data_value DESC;
SELECT application_name, impact_factor FROM environmental_impact_analysis WHERE impact_factor BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7;
SELECT application_name, impact_description FROM environmental_impact_analysis WHERE impact_factor <= 0.2 ORDER BY impact_factor DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalImpactData;
SELECT nanotechnology_application, environmental_parameter FROM EnvironmentalImpactData WHERE measurement_unit = 'ppm';
SELECT id, researcher_name, affiliation FROM ResearcherData ORDER BY publication_count DESC;
SELECT nanoparticle_name, composition, size_nm, toxicity_level FROM NanoparticleData WHERE size_nm > 100 ORDER BY toxicity_level ASC;
SELECT id, researcher_name, email FROM ResearcherData WHERE LOWER(affiliation) LIKE '%university%';
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalImpactData WHERE nanotechnology_application='Healthcare' AND measurement_value > 50 ORDER BY environmental_parameter DESC
SELECT researcher_name, publication_count FROM ResearcherData WHERE affiliation='University' ORDER BY publication_count DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, nanoparticle_name, composition FROM NanoparticleData WHERE size_nm < 10 AND toxicity_level='Low' ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalImpactData WHERE measurement_unit='ppm' AND environmental_parameter LIKE '%carbon%'
SELECT nanoparticle_name, size_nm, toxicity_level FROM NanoparticleData WHERE size_nm BETWEEN 5 AND 20 ORDER BY nanoparticle_name
SELECT * FROM nanotechnology_impact_data;
SELECT research_id, research_title FROM nanotechnology_impact_data ORDER BY research_date DESC;
SELECT research_title, researcher_name, research_date FROM nanotechnology_impact_data WHERE research_location='USA';
SELECT result_value, result_description FROM research_results WHERE result_value > 0.5;
SELECT publication_title, source_url FROM research_sources WHERE research_id=3;
SELECT * FROM nanotechnology_impact_data;
SELECT research_title, researcher_name FROM nanotechnology_impact_data WHERE research_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT research_title, result_value FROM nanotechnology_impact_data JOIN research_results ON nanotechnology_impact_data.research_id = research_results.research_id WHERE result_value > 50;
SELECT research_title, publication_title, source_url FROM nanotechnology_impact_data JOIN research_sources ON nanotechnology_impact_data.research_id = research_sources.research_id;

SELECT researcher_name, metric_name FROM nanotechnology_impact_data JOIN research_results ON nanotechnology_impact_data.research_id = research_results.research_id JOIN environmental_impact_metrics ON research_results.result_id = environmental_impact_metrics.metric_id ORDER BY researcher_name DESC, metric_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM nanotechnology_research ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT project_name, researcher_name, research_area FROM nanotechnology_research WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY project_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT partner_name, organization, email FROM research_partners ORDER BY partner_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM research_results WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY impact_factor DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location_name, region, country FROM research_locations WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY location_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM nanotechnology_research ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC;
SELECT project_name, researcher_name, research_area FROM nanotechnology_research WHERE research_area = 'Nanomaterial Synthesis';
SELECT * FROM research_results WHERE impact_factor > 5 ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT partner_name, organization, email FROM research_partners WHERE organization = 'University of Science';
SELECT metric_name, metric_value, measurement_unit FROM sustainability_metrics ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
